attributes.action: give free james bond tickets to people that don't commit crimes instead of those that do!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why are the police giving free cinema tickets to young reprebates in long eaton (derbyshire) and therfore giving incentives to be a criminal whilst hard working law abiding citezens are yet again left to pay having allready paid for these crooks to benefit through taxes!
